text: Ba bang ba Ma-Arabia a mahoatata har’a ba u poti-potileng, ke baikaketsi; esitana le ba bang ba Ma-Arabia a mahoatata har’a baahi ba Al-Al-Madina, bangangeletse boikaketsing. Uena u mpa u sa ba tsebe róna re’a ba tseba. Re tla ba neha kotlo ha beli, ba be baekeletsoe ka ho romelloa kahlolong e sehloho
